channel.title: BinaryBourbon - Production ML Insights
channel.description: Practical lessons from building AI systems that actually ship. No hype, just patterns that work.

item.title: Building Cost-Effective RAG: From $3K to $150/month
item.description: Complete guide to building RAG systems that don't break the bank. Real techniques that reduced our costs by 95% while improving quality.

item.title: The $200/mo AI SaaS: Architecture That Scales
item.description: Complete architecture breakdown of a profitable AI SaaS running on $200/month infrastructure. Caching strategies, smart routing, and cost optimization that actually works.

item.title: Why Your AI Agent Needs a Cache
item.description: How we reduced inference costs by 95% with smart caching strategies. Real patterns from production systems handling millions of requests.

item.title: 2025 Predictions: AI Agents in Production
item.description: The year of boring AI. Why 2025 will be about making agents reliable, not revolutionary. My take on what's coming for production systems.
